problem_names:
lemma
  fixes B::"bool"
  shows "p \<bullet> (A \<longrightarrow> B = C)"

lemma
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>(x::'a::pt). A \<longrightarrow> (B::'a \<Rightarrow> bool) x = C) = foo"

lemma
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>x y. \<exists>z. x = z \<and> x = y \<longrightarrow> z \<noteq> x) = foo"

lemma
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>f x. f (g (f x))) = foo"

lemma
  fixes p q::"perm"
  and   x::"'a::pt"
  shows "p \<bullet> (q \<bullet> x) = foo"

lemma
  fixes p q r::"perm"
  and   x::"'a::pt"
  shows "p \<bullet> (q \<bullet> r \<bullet> x) = foo"

lemma
  fixes p r::"perm"
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>q::perm. q \<bullet> (r \<bullet> x)) = foo"

lemma
  fixes C D::"bool"
  shows "B (p \<bullet> (C = D))"

lemma
  fixes P :: "(('b \<Rightarrow> bool) \<Rightarrow> ('b::pt)) \<Rightarrow> ('a::pt)"
  shows "p \<bullet> (P The) = foo"

lemma
  fixes  P :: "('a::pt) \<Rightarrow> ('b::pt) \<Rightarrow> bool"
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>(a, b). P a b) = (\<lambda>(a, b). (p \<bullet> P) a b)"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> B = p \<bullet> C

lemma
  fixes B::"bool"
  shows "p \<bullet> (A \<longrightarrow> B = C)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (A \<longrightarrow> B = C)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. A \<longrightarrow> B = C

lemma
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>(x::'a::pt). A \<longrightarrow> (B::'a \<Rightarrow> bool) x = C) = foo"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (\<lambda>x. A \<longrightarrow> B x = C) = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. A \<longrightarrow> (p \<bullet> B) x = C) = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (\<lambda>B. A \<longrightarrow> B = C) = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. A \<longrightarrow> x = C) = foo

lemma
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>x y. \<exists>z. x = z \<and> x = y \<longrightarrow> z \<noteq> x) = foo"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (\<lambda>x y.
                    \<exists>z.
                       x = z \<and> x = y \<longrightarrow> z \<noteq> x) =
    foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x xa.
        \<exists>xb. x = xb \<and> x = xa \<longrightarrow> xb \<noteq> x) =
    foo

lemma
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>f x. f (g (f x))) = foo"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (\<lambda>f x. f (g (f x))) = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x xa. x ((p \<bullet> g) (x xa))) = foo

lemma
  fixes p q::"perm"
  and   x::"'a::pt"
  shows "p \<bullet> (q \<bullet> x) = foo"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> q \<bullet> x = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<bullet> q) \<bullet> p \<bullet> x = foo

lemma
  fixes p q r::"perm"
  and   x::"'a::pt"
  shows "p \<bullet> (q \<bullet> r \<bullet> x) = foo"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> q \<bullet> r \<bullet> x = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<bullet> q) \<bullet> (p \<bullet> r) \<bullet> p \<bullet> x = foo

lemma
  fixes p r::"perm"
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>q::perm. q \<bullet> (r \<bullet> x)) = foo"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (\<lambda>q. q \<bullet> r \<bullet> x) = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>xa. xa \<bullet> (p \<bullet> r) \<bullet> p \<bullet> x) =
    foo

lemma
  fixes C D::"bool"
  shows "B (p \<bullet> (C = D))"
text \<open>there is no raw eqvt-rule for The\<close>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (THE x. P x) = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<bullet> The) (p \<bullet> P) = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<bullet> The) (p \<bullet> P) = foo

lemma
  fixes P :: "(('b \<Rightarrow> bool) \<Rightarrow> ('b::pt)) \<Rightarrow> ('a::pt)"
  shows "p \<bullet> (P The) = foo"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> P The = foo

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (p \<bullet> P) (p \<bullet> The) = foo

lemma
  fixes  P :: "('a::pt) \<Rightarrow> ('b::pt) \<Rightarrow> bool"
  shows "p \<bullet> (\<lambda>(a, b). P a b) = (\<lambda>(a, b). (p \<bullet> P) a b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> (\<lambda>(a, b). P a b) =
    (\<lambda>(a, b). (p \<bullet> P) a b)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>(x, y). (p \<bullet> P) x y) =
    (\<lambda>(x, y). (p \<bullet> P) x y)
